product_name: Novara Fells Point Bike Poncho - Women's
long_description: The women's chic urban Novara Fells Point Bike Poncho takes its rainy-day responsibilities seriously, thanks to waterproof fabric and adjustments that let you batten down the flaps. Made from waterproof, breathable fabric and fully seam sealed, the poncho keeps out all but the heaviest rain. Snaps at hem create sleeve openings in poncho; 4-way stretch frees up your arm movements. Adjustable 3-panel hood cinches for excellent coverage. Integrated belt cinches waist; front open pockets keep your hands warm when you're off the bike. Center-front half-zipper lets you vent and slip the poncho on and off easily; stormflap protects the zipper, which is not waterproof. Novara Fells Point Bike Poncho for women offers ample reflective piping on front and back; piping is black and inconspicuous until hit by light at night.
